name: archie
description: Archie the architect is a customizable build tool and a task runner.
author: The Zimmee <thezimmee@gmail.com>

scripts.test: npm run test:lint -s && npm run test:unit -s
scripts.coveralls: npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls && echo '=> DONE! Test coverage submitted to https://coveralls.io.'
scripts.codacy: npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | ./node_modules/.bin/codacy-coverage && echo '=> DONE! Test coverage submitted to https://codacy.com.'
scripts.codecov: npm test && nyc report --reporter=lcov > coverage.lcov && ./node_modules/.bin/codecov --token=3b10ee78-0f52-466f-8d15-22d2c5e67017 && echo '=> DONE! Test coverage submitted to https://codecov.io.'
